scripts.restart-redis: docker rm --force redis && docker run -p 6379:6379 --name redis -d redis
scripts.restart-redis-cluster: docker rm --force redis-cluster && docker run -p 6379:6379 --name redis-cluster -d redis-cluster
scripts.dev: concurrently "docker start redis" "tsc --watch" "yarn workspace utils dev" "yarn workspace chat-common dev" "nodemon --watch ./dist --watch ../../packages dist/app.js"
scripts.devrc-nodejs: concurrently "tsc --watch" "yarn workspace utils dev" "yarn workspace chat-common dev" "REDIS_CLUSTER=yes nodemon --watch ./dist --watch ../../packages dist/app.js"
